Métrica Studios, Ibiza, Spain
2018-06-01
We designed, built and calibrated a 26 loudspeakers system which, together with our plugins suite, make Métrica Studios a pioneer studio in producing 3D and binaural sound.

Binaural Tools for the Creative Industries, H2020 Project
2017-01-01
For BINCI project we developed a suite of plugins for mixing in binaural the audio guides content of some museums and cultural sites, plus an ambisonics player supporting head tracking for an enhanced visitor experience.
Binaural audio
